messages.content: Can you improve this description. The app doesn't really do anything but sit idle. "balenaCloud container that just idles... might add some metrics on idling later, if I get around to it ;-D"

How about this: "The balenaCloud container is currently in an idle state, awaiting further development. Future updates may include the addition of metrics to track the idle status of the app. Stay tuned for potential enhancements!"
please improve this description "balenaCloud container that just idles... might add some metrics on idling later, if I get around to it ;-D"

How about this revised description: "This balenaCloud container is currently in an idle state, meaning it is not actively performing any tasks. Although it is not currently providing any functionality, future updates may include the addition of metrics to track its idle status. We appreciate your patience and will keep you informed of any further developments."
